publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4748.2 Patrick Harvie: Decision on Abdelbaset Ali Mohmed Al Megrahi—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4748) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end "further notes that the public concerns that continue to exist about Mr Al Megrahi’s case extend to international discussions prior to release, as well as the original conviction, and calls on the UK Government to initiate, as a matter of urgency, a full and wide-ranging public inquiry into all aspects of the case." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-4748.2 Patrick Harvie: Decision on Abdelbaset Ali Mohmed Al Megrahi—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4748) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end "further notes that the public concerns that continue to exist about Mr Al Megrahi’s case extend to international discussions prior to release, as well as the original conviction, and calls on the UK Government to initiate, as a matter of urgency, a full and wide-ranging public inquiry into all aspects of the case."
